tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Explanation of the Workshop and Goals

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create SSH Keys Using Oracle Cloud Shell
tutorials.description: Create SSH keys for use with this lab

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Set Up OCI for Siebel Deployment
tutorials.description: In this lab, the recently provisioned OCI Trial tenancy will be set up for the Siebel Application

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Provisioning the Siebel Application
tutorials.description: In this exercise, you will create your Siebel application by setting up the Siebel Marketplace image and then use Jenkins to deploy an instance of Siebel.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Teardown Your Oracle Siebel Environment
